snippet: Alberto Contador made an audacious break to win the 17th stage of the Spanish Vuelta and take the overall lead from Joaquim Rodríguez.
abstract: Spanish cycling champion Alberto Contador wins the 17th stage of the Vuelta a Espana and take the overall lead from his countryman Joaquim Rodriguez.
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador made an audacious break to win the 17th stage of the Spanish Vuelta and take the overall lead from Joaquim Rodríguez.

headline.main: Contador Wins Stage and Takes Lead in Spanish Vuelta
headline.print_headline: Contador Wins Stage and Takes Lead in Spanish Vuelta
